snippet: Charles Moreau, former mayor of Central Falls, was freed from prison Friday in a deal struck after an appeals court threw his 2012 conviction into question.
abstract: Charles Moreau, former mayor of Central Falls, RI, is freed from prison in deal struck after an appeals court threw his 2012 conviction into question; pleads guilty to new charge of accepting a bribe and being sentenced to time served.
lead_paragraph: Charles Moreau, former mayor of Central Falls, was freed from prison Friday in a deal struck after an appeals court threw his 2012 conviction into question.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Mayor Freed After Bribe Plea
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Mayor Freed After Bribe Plea
